category: National Pension Review Committee Operation Regulations/Article 5 (Appointment and dismissal of members)
contents: Article 5 (Appointment and dismissal of members) ① If a new member needs to be appointed following the expiration of a member's term of office, the Corporation Chairman may request recommendations from related organizations and institutions one month prior to the expiration of the member's term of office. ② Members lose their positions when their term of office expires. ③ The Chairman of the Corporation may dismiss a member if he or she falls under any of the following. [Moved from Paragraph 4 2022. 9. 16., 2022. 9. 16.] 1. When a member himself/herself requests resignation 2. When there is a change in the qualifications for appointment or when a recommending organization or institution requests dismissal 3. A member If an act is committed in violation of the provisions of Article 6 and Paragraph 3 of Article 7. ④ If a member is dismissed pursuant to Paragraph 3, the member shall lose his or her position from the time the CEO of the Corporation notifies the dismissal. Newly established 2022. 9. 16.
